verses:
Help Lord, the souls that thou has made,
he souls to thee so dear,
n prison for the debt unpaid
f sin committed here.

These holy souls, they suffer on.
esigned in heart and will,
ntil thy high behest is done. 
nd justice has its fill.

For daily falls, for pardoned crime,
ey joy to undergo
e shadow of thy Cross sublime,
e remnant of thy woe.

Oh, by their patience of delay
heir hope amid their pain.
heir sacred zeal to burn away. 
isfigurement and stain;

Good Jesu, help! sweet Jesu, aid
The souls to Thee most dear,
In prison for the debt unpaid
Of sins committed here.
